H0.text: The digestive system is the body system that breaks down food and absorbs nutrients.

H1.text: The skeletal system breaks down food and absorbs nutrients.

H2.text: The circulation system breaks down food and absorbs nutrients.

H3.text: The hormonal system is the body system that breaks down food and absorbs nutrients.

A4.text: Digestion involves the breakdown of food into smaller and smaller components, until they can be absorbed and assimilated into the body.
